thread.title: Cramer's lightning round: Stay out of housing play Radian's stock

author: Elizabeth Gurdus
title: Cramer's lightning round: Stay out of housing play Radian's stock
text:
Radian Group : "No. The housing market's slowing and I don't want to be there.
Chegg : "I think you ka-ching, ka-ching half of it and let the rest run. Let's not be pigs."
Ternium : "What're you doing with TX? Would you step up to Nucor ? They pre-announced and it's not even up, for heaven's sake."
